title: Format-Only Validation
description: Detects when information is excluded solely because it is not in a predefined file format or data structure, rather than based on its actual content or relevance.
indicators: Rejection of submissions not in a specific file format (e.g., only accepting .docx and ignoring .txt or .md)
Dismissal of data that doesnâ€™t conform to a specific technical schema regardless of its informational value
